name: Khushi
greetingText: Did you know it's illegal to steal hearts? And you have a criminal smile!
wishText: 9th March 2023: The best day of my life. I'm sooo happy to sign up for your infinite crazy ideas. And and, if I get little scared sometimes, just hold my hand (and help me cross the road) and get me some water (ikykik). And I would never let you go, LOML.
